mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: with turkey in a bacon flavour sauce:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (16% of which turkey 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Various sugars.*chunks: 46% Meat and animal derivatives.with duck in a sauce with carrot:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (16%, of which duck 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Vegetables (0.7% carrot dehydrated equivalent to 6.3% carrot in the sauce), Various sugars.with lamb in a game flavour sauce:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (16% of which lamb 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Various sugars.*chunks: 46% Meat and animal derivatives.with beef in a sauce with tomato:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (16%, of which beef 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, Vegetables (0.9% tomato dehydrated equivalent to 8.1% tomato in the sauce), minerals, Various sugars.*chunks: 46% Meat and animal derivatives.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 724; Vit D3: 111; Vit E: 16; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 8.3); 3b202: (I: 0.21); 3b405: (Cu: 0.73); 3b503: (Mn: 1.6); 3b605: (Zn: 14.8); 3a370: 456.Flavouring.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 724; Vit D3: 111; Vit E: 16; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 8.3); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.21); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.73); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.6); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 14.8); taurine: 456.Flavourings.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: turkey in bacon sauce, duck in carrot sauce, lamb in game sauce, beef in tomato sauce

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 4 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 4 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.For an average adult sterilised cat (4kg), feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals.
